column5: first of many I hope! got this brute on a mepps black fury casting from shore. Released to be caught again another day
Man that's a nice catch!! can't wait to get out there
beauty fish. Spent today spring cleaning the boat. Hoping for some decent weather next weekend to head out on the lake
Beauty for sure!1st of many more I hope as well!
Awesome fish man! Got 'er from shore eh? That's impressive. I've tried my luck at casting the big lake from shore.... nothing but lake weed.
it was actually the shoreline of a well known park in hamilton.
Sweet... I hope to catch my first brown this year.
You took the picture in the right spot, when you enlarge it, inscribed in the wood looks like fata boona, not sure who that is but its certainly is a fata boona
I can't believe that thing is alive, lol!!   Nice fish, we got a nice fatty out on the lake this weekend as well.
Way to pop that cherry. Continued success to you.
